detail.title: Refactor data storage
description: Data are not transformed before storage anymore ("Greeting: "Hello, World!"" was stored as "Greeting: "Hello, World!"")

detail.title: Implement MySQL reconnect
description: When PHP lost the MySQL connection, it is now able to reconnect without generating a fatal error

detail.title: Refactor back office mass upload
description: It now supports reccurcive directory, huge files import, language selection, display usefull informations, is faster, safer

detail.title: Refactor back office breadcrumb
description: Items are now clickable, more precise and subpages are now supported

detail.title: Refactor the front office video "add to" tab
description: New way to display elements : more mobile friendly, fix bugs, ...

detail.title: Refactor error handling
description: Update the way error messages are managed

detail.title: Upgrade video convertion
description: Better tasklist support (no more full cpu charge when waiting for lock), support for audio track selection, fix audio negative start time, better 16:9 resolution and codecs detection

detail.title: Implement Chromecast Support with back office option
description: This option enable the Chromecast support on the default video player

detail.title: Upgrade users passwords security
description: Replace the MD5 implementation with salted SHA512

detail.title: Implement search for collections
description: Search for collection like you do it for videos

detail.title: Implement new option to totally disable ads
description: This option disable back office menu, JS and CSS front office integration, specific HTML elements for ads

detail.title: Implement new option to differentiate video and photo allowed extensions
description: There's now two distincts lists of allowed extensions

detail.title: Implement new users permissions
description: New permissions to limit the access to photos, collections, apply existing permissions on missing spots (like search)

detail.title: Easy installation scripts
description: Don't search anymore for Debian 9 & 10, Ubuntu 17.10 & 16.04, CentOS 7 installation, there's a script for that now

detail.title: Update VideoJS Player
description: VideoJS Player has been updated to 7.8.1

detail.title: Fixs
description: Fix HTML/CSS/JS error/warnings/notices, many broken configurations, installation process, infinite loops, email tester, back office and front office pagination, many thumbs display, ...

detail.title: Others
description: Fix typos, cleanup installation SQL, cleanup code, use translation instead of hardcoded texts, remove unused code and files (including a full back office unused theme), document PHP functions, use relative URLs, don't allow to play a video while it is converting, ...
